solution_line_template: First, find how many calories the walk burned by multiplying the calories burned per mile by the number of miles Cary walked: {miles_walked} miles * {calories_per_mile} calories/mile = <<{miles_walked}*{calories_per_mile}={calories_burned_walking}>>{calories_burned_walking} calories

Then subtract the calories Corey ate to find the net calories Cary burned: {calories_burned_walking} calories - {calories_eaten} calories = <<{calories_burned_walking}-{calories_eaten}={net_calorie_deficit}>>{net_calorie_deficit} calories
